item.title: Jon's Garden Notes
item.description: This page is just for brainstorming ideas for Fammatre’s garden program. Maintenance Create an inventory of our equipment and supplies. Remove or repair broken tools. Determine what equiment and supplies are needed. Create a map of our garden beds with descriptions of what is currently planted. Phase out non zone 9b plants. Create a system of ownership for each plant and garden bed. Repair any rotting wood or broken screws. Create an irrigation system map.
